Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 1.9 × 1.9 nm2 (orthogonal 1D open channels), 1.3 nm and 2.3 nm (DFT pore distribution)

Other Information.Additional Info: Yield decreased for longer chain amines under size-selective conditions.
Yield decreased compared to diethylamine due to size selectivity.
Lowest yield among unbranched dialkylamines due to size exclusion.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale based on amine chain length

Experimental Validation.Method: Catalytic N–H insertion reactions of ethyl 2-diazoacetate (EDA) into secondary amines
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Diethylamine: 75% yield, Dibutylamine: 63% yield, Dipentylamine: 23% yield (for particles < 0.054 mm)

Other Information.Additional Info: Ru-PMOF-1(Hf) exhibits size selectivity in catalysis, unlike the corresponding homogeneous catalyst Ru(TMCPP)(CO).
